en (copy).artefacts_help: Thanks for using MaharaDroid! To get started touch Start button, then Preferences and enter your Mahara username and set an initial token. At the same time visit Mahara (Settings) and set the same token value and click update. Back in MaharaDroid touch your back button, and an authentication attempt will be made. Once authenticated, check the Menu for writing Journal posts and uploading files. Alternatively when taking photos, videos or recording audio, look for options to \'share\' these files with MaharaDroid.
en (copy).pref_base_url_summary: Enter the Mahara base URL for file posts & syncronisation
en (copy).pref_upload_url_summary: Enter the URL to post files to Mahara
en (copy).pref_sync_url_summary: Enter the sync URL to Mahara
en (copy).pref_upload_connection_summary: Restrict upload to the following connection types (default is fall back to handset settings):
en (copy).pref_upload_journal_default_summary: Check to select a default journal to post to
en (copy).pref_upload_journal_summary: Select the default journal to post to. Note: nothing will be shown until your first sync.
en (copy).pref_upload_folder_default_summary: Check to select the default folder to upload your files into
en (copy).pref_upload_folder_summary: Select the default folder to upload your files into. Note: nothing will be shown until your first sync.
en (copy).pref_upload_tags_default_summary: Check to select the default tag to add to all uploaded files/journals
en (copy).pref_upload_tags_summary: Select the default tag to add to all uploaded files/journals. Note: nothing will be shown until your first sync.
en (copy).pref_sync_notification_summary: Raise notifications if new messages are found during syncronisation.
en (copy).pref_sync_periodic_summary: Enter the time in minutes to force a perioidc sync (0 or blank for none)
en (copy).pref_sync_time_summary: The time, in seconds, received from the server of last sync.
en (copy).uploadnotavailable: Sorry you can only uploaded files.
en (copy).capturefailed: Sorry there was a problem capturing that image.
en (copy).uploadnoconnection: Sorry you don't have a working data connection to upload at this time.
en (copy).uploadincomplete: Sorry you must enter a title and an entry for journal posts
en (copy).upload_journal_prompt: Upload file(s) or post to a Journal
en (copy).upload_is_draft_text: Check this if your entry is a draft. As a draft no one except you can see it.
en (copy).upload_allow_comments_text: Check this to allow comments on your entry.
en (copy).upload_confirm_text: Yes, the file I am attempting to upload is my own or I have express permission to reproduce and/or distribute this item. My use of this file does not breach any local Copyright legislation. This file also adheres to the Terms and Conditions outlined on this site.
en (copy).load_config_download_error: Sorry there was an error downloading the configuration file.
en (copy).load_config_error: Sorry there was an error parsing the configuration file.
en (copy).scan_not_available: Sorry you need to install ZXing Barcode Scanner for this.
en (copy).only_one_account: Currently you may only have at most one account at any one time.
en (copy).auth_result_no_connection: Server address or port number incorrect
en (copy).auth_result_fail_long: Authentication failed, check your connection and user token.

Mon utilisation de ce document n'enfreint aucun droit local ou internation sur le Copyright. Ce document adhére aux Conditions d'utilisation en vigueurs sur ce site.

sl.artefacts_help: Hvala, da uporabljate MaharaDroid! Če želite začeto, se dotaknite gumba Start, nato Nastavitve ter vnesite vaše Mahara uporabniško ime in nastavite začetni žeton. Hkrati obiščite spletišče Mahara (Nastavitve), nastavite isto vrednost žetona in kliknite Posodobi. V aplikaciji MaharaDroid se dotaknite gumba Nazaj, da se bo začel poizkus overjanja. Ko boste uspešno overjeni, odprite meni za pisanje objav v dnevik in za nalaganje datotek. Ko fotografirate, snemate video ali zvok, poiščite možnost za \'deljenje\' teh datotek z aplikacijo MaharaDroid.
sl.pref_auth_token_summary: Vpišite žeton za nalaganje na Maharo
sl.pref_base_url_summary: Vpišite osnovni URL Mahare za  pošiljanje datotek in sinhronizacijo
sl.pref_upload_url_summary: Vpišite URL za pošiljanje datotek na Maharo
sl.pref_sync_url_summary: Vpišite URL za sinhronizacijo z Maharo
sl.pref_upload_connection_summary: Omeji nalaganje izdelkov na naslednje vrste povezav (privzeto so uporabljene nastavitve telefona):
sl.pref_upload_journal_default_summary: Obkljukajte, če želite izbrati privzeti dnevnik za vnose
sl.pref_upload_journal_summary: Izberite privzeti dnevnik za vnose. Opomba: nič ne bo prikazano do prve sinhronizacije.
sl.pref_upload_folder_default_summary: Obkljukajte, če želite izbrati privzeto mapo za nalaganje datotek
sl.pref_upload_folder_summary: Izberite privzeto mapo za nalaganje datotek. Opomba: nič ne bo prikazano do prve sinhronizacije.
sl.pref_upload_tags_default_summary: Obkljukajte, če želite izbrati privzete oznake vsem naloženim datotekam/dnevnikom
sl.pref_upload_tags_summary: Izberite privzete oznake vsem naloženim datotekam/dnevnikom. Opomba: nič ne bo prikazano do prve sinhronizacije.
sl.pref_sync_notification_summary: Obvesti me, če med sinhronizacijo najdeš nova sporočila.
sl.pref_sync_periodic_summary: Vnesite čas v minutah, da vsilite periodično sinhronizacijo (0 ali prazno pomeni brez)
sl.pref_sync_time_summary: Čas, v sekundah, od zadnje sinhrinizacije, prejet od strežnika.
sl.uploadnotavailable: Oprostite, toda naložite lahko le datoteke.
sl.capturefailed: Prišlo je do težav z zajemanjem slike.
sl.uploadnoconnection: Oprosite, trenutno za nalaganje nimate nobene delujoče podatkovne povezave.
sl.uploadincomplete: Oprostite, za vnos v dnevnik morate vnesti naslov in vsebino.
sl.upload_journal_prompt: Naloži datoteke ali vnose v dnevnik
sl.upload_is_draft_text: Obkljukajte, če je to osnutek vnosa. Osnutka ne vidi nihče razen vas.
sl.upload_allow_comments_text: Obkljukajte, če želite omogočiti komentiranje tega vnosa.
sl.upload_confirm_text: Datoteka, ki jo nameravam naložiti, je moja oz. imam pisno
sl.load_config_download_error: Oprostite, prišlo je do napake pri nalaganju nastavitvene datoteke.
sl.load_config_error: Oprostite, prišlo je do napake pri izvajanju nastavitvene datoteke.
sl.scan_not_available: Oprostite, za to morate namestiti ZXing Barcode Scanner.
sl.only_one_account: Trenutno lahko hkrati uporabljate največ en račun.
sl.auth_result_no_connection: Napačen naslov strežnika ali številka vrat
sl.auth_result_fail_long: Overjanje neuspešno, preverite povezavo in uporabniški žeton.
